service.query: SELECT YYYYMM ,TOT_SALE_AMT -- 총매출 ,CUST_SALE_AMT--회원매출 ,NCUST_SALE_AMT-- 비회원매출 ,PRE_CUST_SALE_AMT --회원전매출 ,PRE_NCUST_SALE_AMT --비회원전매출 ,ADD_CUST_SALE_AMT --회원매출증감 ,ADD_NCUST_SALE_AMT --비회원매출증감 ,ADD_CUST_SALE_RATE --회원매출증감율 ,ADD_NCUST_SALE_RATE --비회원매출증감율 ,CUST_SALE_RATE --회원매출구성비 ,NCUST_SALE_RATE -- 비회원매출구성비 ,TOT_DANGA-- 총매출 객단가 ,CUST_DANGA--회원매출 객단가 ,NCUST_DANGA-- 비회원매출 객단가 ,ROUND(CUST_DANGA / NCUST_DANGA, 2)||':1' AS CUST_NUCUST_DANGA_RATE-- 회원대비회원매출 객단가비 ,CUST_CNT_XX--총매출객수 ,CUST_CNT_YY--회원매출객수 ,CUST_CNT_YY_1 --비회원매출객수 FROM ( SELECT XX.YYYYMM ,NORM_SALE_AMT AS TOT_SALE_AMT -- 총매출 ,NVL(SALE_AMT,0) AS CUST_SALE_AMT--회원매출 ,NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0) AS NCUST_SALE_AMT-- 비회원매출 ,LAG(NVL(SALE_AMT,0)) OVER (ORDER BY XX.YYYYMM) AS PRE_CUST_SALE_AMT --회원전매출 ,LAG(NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0),1) OVER (ORDER BY XX.YYYYMM) AS PRE_NCUST_SALE_AMT --비회원전매출 ,NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - LAG(NVL(SALE_AMT,0)) OVER (ORDER BY XX.YYYYMM) AS ADD_CUST_SALE_AMT --회원매출증감 ,NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - LAG(NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0),1) OVER (ORDER BY XX.YYYYMM) AS ADD_NCUST_SALE_AMT --비회원매출증감 ,CASE WHEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - LAG(NVL(SALE_AMT,0)) OVER (ORDER BY XX.YYYYMM)) / NVL(SALE_AMT,0) * 100, 2) END AS ADD_CUST_SALE_RATE --회원매출증감율 ,CASE WHEN NVL(SALE_AMT,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0) - LAG(NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0),1) OVER (ORDER BY XX.YYYYMM)) / (NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0)) * 100, 2) END AS ADD_NCUST_SALE_RATE --비회원매출증감율 ,DECODE(NORM_SALE_AMT,0,0,ROUND((NVL(SALE_AMT,0)/NORM_SALE_AMT)*100,2)) AS CUST_SALE_RATE --회원매출구성비 ,DECODE(NORM_SALE_AMT,0,0, ROUND(((NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0))/NORM_SALE_AMT)*100,2)) AS NCUST_SALE_RATE -- 비회원매출구성비 ,ROUND(NORM_SALE_AMT/ XX.CUST_CNT) AS TOT_DANGA-- 총매출 객단가 ,DECODE(NVL(YY.CUST_CNT,1),0,0, ROUND(NVL(SALE_AMT,0)/ NVL(YY.CUST_CNT,1))) AS CUST_DANGA--회원매출 객단가 ,DECODE((XX.CUST_CNT - NVL(YY.CUST_CNT,0)),0,0, ROUND((NORM_SALE_AMT - NVL(SALE_AMT,0))/(XX.CUST_CNT - NVL(YY.CUST_CNT,0)))) AS NCUST_DANGA-- 비회원매출 객단가 ,XX.CUST_CNT AS CUST_CNT_XX--총매출객수 ,YY.CUST_CNT AS CUST_CNT_YY--회원매출객수 ,(XX.CUST_CNT - NVL(YY.CUST_CNT,0))AS CUST_CNT_YY_1 --비회원매출객수 FROM ( --SELECT STR_CD, SUBSTR(SALE_DT,1,6) YYYYMM, SUM(NORM_SALE_AMT) NORM_SALE_AMT, SUM(DECODE(CUST_CNT,0,1,CUST_CNT)) CUST_CNT SELECT SUBSTR(SALE_DT,1,6) YYYYMM, SUM(NORM_SALE_AMT) NORM_SALE_AMT, SUM(DECODE(CUST_CNT,0,1,CUST_CNT)) CUST_CNT FROM DPS.PS_DAYPBN A WHERE STR_CD = '01' AND SALE_DT >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'01' AND SALE_DT <= ?||'31' GROUP BY SUBSTR(SALE_DT,1,6) ORDER BY 1,2,3 ) XX, ( --SELECT STR_CD, SUBSTR(SALE_DT,1,6) YYYYMM, SUM(SALE_AMT) SALE_AMT, COUNT(1) CUST_CNT SELECT SUBSTR(SALE_DT,1,6) YYYYMM, SUM(NORM_SALE_AMT) SALE_AMT, COUNT(1) CUST_CNT FROM DPS.PS_DAYCUST B WHERE 1=1 --STR_CD = '01' AND SALE_DT >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM')||'01' AND SALE_DT <= ?||'31' --GROUP BY STR_CD, SUBSTR(SALE_DT,1,6) GROUP BY SUBSTR(SALE_DT,1,6) ) YY WHERE 1=1 --XX.STR_CD = YY.STR_CD(+) AND XX.YYYYMM = YY.YYYYMM(+) ORDER BY YYYYMM ) WHERE YYYYMM >= ? AND YYYYMM <= ? ORDER BY YYYYMM DESC
